title: Conjuration Spells
content:
Conjure Woodland Beings

Teleport yourself and up to 1 adjacent ally to a place you can see. The ally cannot be larger than medium.Melee

Evard's Black Tentacles

3d6 BludgeoningTentacles sprout from the ground, turning the area into Difficult Terrain, attacking and Smothering creatures within.

6m 18m WIS Save Concentration
